sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {useMachine} from '@xstate/react' import {actionMachine} from '../stateMachines/actionMachine' const initialData = { name: 'Excessive operation', status: 'new', assignee: 'bill' } const IssueCard = ({data = initialData}) => { const [issue, setIssue] = React.useState(data) const setStatus = (status) => setIssue({...issue, status}) const isNew = issue.status === 'new' const isHold = issue.status === 'onHold' const isNotDoing = issue.status === 'notDoing' const isResolved = issue.status === 'resolved' return (

Name: {issue.name}

Assignee: {issue.assignee}

Status: {issue.status}

Actions

{isNew && } {isHold && }
) } export default IssueCard
